supabase.name: Supabase (Hosted MCP Service)
supabase.description: Direct access to Supabase platform via official hosted MCP service. Provides database, authentication, storage, realtime, and Edge Functions capabilities.

capabilities.account: List and manage Supabase projects and organizations
capabilities.docs: Search Supabase documentation for up-to-date information
capabilities.database: List tables, execute SQL, manage migrations and extensions
capabilities.debugging: Get logs and advisory notices for projects
capabilities.development: Get project URLs, API keys, and generate TypeScript types
capabilities.functions: List, retrieve, and deploy Edge Functions
capabilities.branching: Create and manage development branches (paid plans)

when_to_use: Database schema design and table management
Authentication setup (email, OAuth, magic links, JWT)
TypeScript type generation from database schema

agent_instructions.activation: When researching Supabase features, database design, authentication, storage, or real-time capabilities.
agent_instructions.usage: Query Supabase MCP for official documentation, implementation patterns, and best practices. Use for schema design, auth strategies, and service configuration.
agent_instructions.integration: Incorporate findings into technical specifications with specific Supabase implementation details, noting any tier limitations or constraints.
best_practices: Always check free tier vs. paid tier limits
Verify RLS policies cover all security requirements
Consider connection pooling for serverless environments
Use read-only mode for production safety
Scope MCP to specific project when possible

configuration.note: Official Supabase hosted MCP service. OAuth authentication happens automatically during MCP client setup.

project_ref.description: Scope MCP to a specific Supabase project (RECOMMENDED)
project_ref.location: Supabase Dashboard → Settings → General → Project ID
project_ref.security_benefit: Limits MCP access to one project instead of all projects in your organization
project_ref.note: Account-level tools (list_projects, list_organizations) will be unavailable when scoped

read_only.description: Restrict MCP to read-only operations (RECOMMENDED for production)
read_only.security_benefit: Prevents write operations, SQL executes as read-only Postgres user

features.note: Reduce attack surface by enabling only needed tool groups

recommended_url.rationale: Project-scoped, read-only, with essential tool groups for safe development

database_schema.description: Design and manage database tables and relationships
database_schema.example: Research table structure for multi-tenant application with RLS

authentication.example: Implement OAuth with Google and GitHub providers

storage.description: Manage file uploads and storage buckets
storage.example: Configure storage buckets with RLS for team file isolation

edge_functions.example: Deploy Edge Function for webhook processing

realtime.example: Configure real-time channels for chat application

documentation_search.example: Find best practices for connection pooling

type_generation.example: Create type-safe client code for frontend

free_tier.note: Projects pause after 1 week of inactivity

security_considerations.prompt_injection_risk: LLMs may follow malicious instructions in user content. Always review tool calls before execution.
security_considerations.oauth_permissions: MCP authenticates with your developer permissions. Never share MCP access with end users.
recommendations: Scope to specific development project, not production
Enable manual approval for all tool calls in your MCP client
Use development branches for testing (paid feature)
Limit feature groups to only what's needed
Never connect MCP to production databases with real user data

how_to_use.for_agents: Activate when researching Supabase capabilities, database design, authentication strategies, storage patterns, or realtime features. Query for official documentation and implementation patterns.
how_to_use.for_humans: This configuration connects AI agents to the official Supabase hosted MCP service. Agents can search docs, query database schemas, understand RLS policies, and research auth/storage configurations.
